website_summaries.verdict: Wearers love the moisture-wicking material and breathable design.
pros: Works well as an everyday bra
Convenient convertible straps can be linked together to be concealed with racer back tops
One of the few styles featuring solid colors and patterns
Soft shape of the cup and straps make for a near-seamless design
cons: Wearers of the previous iteration of the bra say the newer style feels too lightweight

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth bra
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying clothes cause they never seem to fit. This bra fits very well. It's pretty comfortable even while sweating. Well made. No scratchy areas. I have uneven boobs and it still allows for that. Have bought a couple of these bras. Lightly lined. Just enough lining to prevent nipples from showing. Lining is even across bras. It is NOT padded like a push up bra. I hate uneven padding. This bras is great.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Loose straps and defective racerback option.
customer_reviews.text: The straps on this are too long and loose so they slip off my shoulders and it only get worse the longer I have it on. I am only 5'3" tall so that may be a factor. I also ordered this for the racerback option, which if it worked would help with this problem, however the hook that is on the back is facing the wrong direction so I cannot use it that way (facing away from the other strap). I am not sure if this is a factory second since it is defective in that manner. Very disappointing since it would be perfect in every other way.
customer_reviews.author: maria davida

customer_reviews.title: i like these bras because they have a stiffer
customer_reviews.text: i like these bras because they have a stiffer, flower-shaped area inside the cup to prevent fripples from showing, and the clasp attached to the strap to criss-cross the straps in the back is easily rotated into the band so it doesn't stick out if you wear it like a normal bra. the bras are a little snug for me right after washing (i leave them to air dry), but they do loosen a little as they are worn.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Finally a bra that fits and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am probably among most women who have struggled for years trying to find an affordable, comfortable, well-fitting bra. Well Hanes may have finally accomplished the impossible! I usually wear anywhere between a 34D to a 36DD (depending on the bra maker...which is a completely different issue in and of itself). I purchased a 34DD in this bra and the fit was perfect, and more importantly, it is so comfortable. When I get home from work the first thing I want to do is remove my uncomfortable bra...I have actually been forgetting to take my bra off after work because it is just not as uncomfortable as my $55 bras from VS. I totally recommend this bra!
customer_reviews.author: BRCH

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative to Evil Nursing Bras
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra to have an alternative to my nursing bras, which I HATE. I refuse spend a million dollars on good nursing bras that will only end up annoying me because your boob size fluctuates. This is a great alternative. I love the hook in the back that you can choose to use or not use, and the cups/wires are comfy! It even has petals where your nips are to prevent a "cold day" from happening. You have to experiment when your nursing with size options, but I got it right the second time! Highly recommend for a good, cheap option. I'll update how they wear over time.
customer_reviews.author: shannonu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I read great reviews about this bra, but am not as impressed as others by the support. I have worn Victoria’s Secret for many years and am used to good support, but thought I would give another brand a try, and unfortunately, I found that these wear down much quicker. The quality, style and comfort is there, but if you are larger than a B, this bra probably isn’t for you. The elasticity seemed to wear out after just a few months of wear, and I found myself adjusting the straps daily.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much the perfect everyday bra. It fits great, looks flattering and it's comfortable all day long. As a few other reviewers noted, the straps are comfortable and stay put, but they might be a bit long for some women.The foam cups are quite soft and "airy" compared to other brands I've tried, though it feels like the cups are slightly on the small side. Looks invisible under clothes and even seems to hold up well in the wash. And to top it all off, it's even a bargain price...what could be better?
customer_reviews.author: Busy Executive

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and smooth material but not the most comfortable bra. It’s not terribly uncomfortable and definitely works fine especially for the price. The discomfort could just because of my larger bust, not much is comfortable with DDs. I was very happy to find this bra available in my size, again especially at this price point. The convertible design will make this a versatile bra for travel. I’m happy with my purchase, not overjoyed but happy enough. I can’t attest to the long term durability but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not for small boobs
customer_reviews.text: I like this bra. It fits well and holds everything nicely, the petals are an especially nice touch since my office is always freezing. The cups have a nice shape but sit a little side-set. I would not suggest this bra for anyone under a D cup. I still prefer the nice rounded shape of my Calvin Klein bra but this bra has a nice amount of give to it which has been great because I'm in my second trimester of pregnancy. Small complaint, the straps don't tighten as much as i'd like them too. I feel like the bra would fit better if my straps were a little tighter because the bust is already at a comfortably tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: McClain

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously THE most comfortable and best fitting bra I have bought at this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously THE most comfortable and best fitting bra I have bought at this price in years. It doesn't give weird impressions on your back, the straps don't oppress your shoulders, the material is SUPER comfortable and I am so surprised that as comfortable as it is, it's also SUPER SUPPORTIVE on not only the back but the lift itself... You have to buy it for yourself to understand what I mean. It's really hard to explain, just buy it. You won't regret it! I'm a 34DD and this gave the best support in a bra I've had in years!
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great BUT I Can't Wear It!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bra which I bought to wear under tshirts and tighter fitting tops. I tried it on and I immediately noticed that they had nipple cover/pastys inside the bra over the nipple area. I thought that was fine until I put on a top and you can see the whole outline of the nipple cover and it is all dented and not a "smooth tshirt bra at all. I guess I will only be able to wear it under loose fitting clothes or sweaters, BUT that isn't why I bought it so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom's World

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute, love it
customer_reviews.text: This bra is super comfortable after having it for a month and washing it a few times now. I was hesitant to try something new after years of Victoria's Secret devotion (so supportive and they last forever), but this was such a simple and soft design that looked great for my t-shirt and jeans style. I really find this bra so much more comfortable than what I've been used to. I'm 43 and have started getting that bit of spare tire around the middle, and this bra is comfortable regardless what position I'm sitting (my jeans are less forgiving). I ordered a second one right away because I feel confident these will be my go to bras from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Meant For Larger Bust
customer_reviews.text: While the overall feel of this bra is light and comfy without any harsh underwire digging in (great for summertime), it is not meant for a larger chest AT ALL. Upon first use, the straps rolled/folded in on themselves, digging in to my shoulders for the remainder of the day. As a 36 DD, I have a larger/heavier bust and need a fair amount of support both in the cups and straps so this was very disappointing ultimately. In addition, the color I ordered was called "oatmeal heather" online, but the item I received was a simple light nude leading me to leave a 2 star rating for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Causes major skin irritation!
customer_reviews.text: While I love the bra, the color, the fit,etc....each of the two bras I bought like this have left ugly, painful red welt/rashes where the underwire hits. I bought in December and have wore both sporadically, trying to give them a chance. They have been washed and line dried. It is just the underwire! It does not lay down smoothly and irritates...stabs at... the skin unmercifully, thus causing every other brand of bra I wear to irritate. I have tested it on the weekend- without these bras, the rash and pain go away. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: T Crane

customer_reviews.title: Second place bra
customer_reviews.text: Meet my second runner up in the ultimate bra competition. This bra is more of a cotton feel material, like a shirt, but still with the lycra-ish stretch that is so vital to controlling the bra rolls and providing a smooth look. The cups are thin and flexible, letting your natural shape take over, but enough to cover nipple show through. I like how this bra comes in fun colors as well, making it seem less like a granny bra. I have overall been really pleasantly surprised with Hanes bras.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Yaaas!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! Like a lot of is, I've gained a few lbs during quarantine, so all my clothes have gotten a little snug, including my undergarments. I've been buying random bras from Walmart, but none have really been that great. I figured I'd give this one a whirl while I was buying some new shirts, and let me say...it's awesome! Perfect amount of stretch and lift. The price is great, and it's so comfy! I'll be buying more very soon!
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: They fit but there’s a downside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it fit amazing but I wore it for an entire day for the first time and already there is something on the bra that is jabing into my skin. I guess they didn’t stitch the sole correctly on this one. I am highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Armanda N

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Did I just find the most comfortable bra ever in my 32 years of live? YES! OMG, YES!! This bra, wait I'm wearing a bra? Kind of forget it's there - often. I took stars off the "stretch" of it because the straps are not long. It fits me fine but if I were taller or had a longer torso, the straps wouldn't fit. Other than that, fits great, true to size! I want in every color until the end of time. It's that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline C

customer_reviews.title: This bra changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail and my heart sunk. "This is way to big, I could wear it as a hat!" I joked. But turns out its actually a perfect fit and I have my answer as to why I hate wearing bras so much. I've been buying the wrong size for years!! Buying this bra changed everything! This particular bra gives me tons of coverage and I don't get that soreness under my breasts after a long day pressed up against underwire. It's not exactly sexy, but it's comfortable and practical, and doesn't show any lines through your clothes. I call it my weekday bra. I'm totally buying a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but needed more padding.
customer_reviews.text: The bra is incredibly comfortable, the straps don't dig in to the shoulders, and the underwire doesn't poke at my sides. The material is soft; I can wear it all day (at home...)! The bra provides a full-coverage for the breasts, true to size. There's a little metal hook on the straps for extra security. My one complaint about this bra: the metal for that hook rusts over time and the bra doesn't have much padding so if you're cold and wear shirts that are fairly...tight around the breast area, you will see nipples. I would recommend using an extra pad, or just wear the bra around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and is super cute, but not comfortable for all day wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and is super cute, but not comfortable for all day wear and being active. Rubbed under my arms really bad and where the underwire hits under my arms actually broke skin sometimes or created blisters. It's so comfortable just trying on and standing in front of the mirror in, but I need something that lasts me through my 10 hour work day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bra. It fits perfectly and has just the right amount of support without being bulky or chunky. It is soft and feels really nice against the skin making this bra very comfortable. I also love the halter back feature as well. This was a pleasant surprise and plus to an all ready amazing bra. When wearing my t-shirts the cups are seamless giving a smooth look to the shirt in the front and back. The construction of the bra seems to be high quality and well made. I will be ordering several more in various colors. I would recommend this bra to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Long

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This bra fit pretty good. Due to the pandemic, I was unable to try on bras in a store. I googled how to measure and hoped for the best (I'd recently lost a little weight and old bras were gappy.) I have order 3 now (one at a time). They are consistently made and fit the same. I do wash them in the washer on gentle, but air dry. I would definitely recommend air-drying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, CHEAPEST bra I have owned in years ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, CHEAPEST bra I have owned in years that actually worked! I love the fact the it has a ring on the back to attach to the other side to make racer back for all my workout shirts I wear. It's quick and easy to covert from regular straps to racer back. No parts to lose and doesn't hurt my back. Holds up well. 34 DD actually fit the way it should and comfortable. Like others said straps are a little loose but nothing a stitch can't fix. I never have luck with bra shopping, so this will now be my go to for now on!
customer_reviews.author: LM.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is one of the most comfortable bras that I've owned. I'm 5'9" and 200lbs. I've been fitted multiple times to a 36 DD. I felt that the cups were slightly smaller than other bras I've gotten in the past. This wasn't an issue for me personally, it was still comfortable to wear. I ordered the oatmeal heather and I'm on the fairer side and it matches very well to my skin tone. The only problem I've had is that the inner edge of the padding has started to fold upwards and isn't sitting as smooth against the skin.
customer_reviews.author: A and J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this same model of bra for years. This version (2019) is especially comfortable, the straps are very flexible and soft. Comfortable enough to wear to work. Appreciate the petal cup to avoid poking through. This is a basic bra that is no frills, doesn’t “add” volume or push up, which I like! I will continue to buy this same model as long as they make it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ (Nevermind)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE JUNE 2020: They changed the clasps in the back from metal to plastic. I bought another one of these bras recently (because I loved them) and this one IS SO SQUEAKY. I tried to tough it out but literally anyone around me could hear my every movement. Way to screw up the only bra I’ve ever liked. This is literally the only bra I will wear. Very comfortable and affordable, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: R Homan

customer_reviews.title: Not at all Oatmeal Heather - the color I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I'm primarily disappointed with the color that I received. I ordered OATMEAL HEATHER and got a solid nude color. It's a little bit of a let down, since the price was decent. I guess I'll keep these but won't order this again. I also noticed that the same bras that I already own (Hanes and same model number as these) have different percentages of materials, one being MORE spandex than in my current bras, and that's disappointing, too. I don't think they'll "hold up" as well.
customer_reviews.author: LYoung

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I never write bad reviews. But this is probably one of the worst bras I have ever bought. Had high hopes for this bra. First, it has these flower cut outs that are supposed to help hide you nipples but you can see them through the bra and give it an odd shape. Second, and the worst part about the bra, the plastic underwire squeaks every time I move. Didn't speak at first but after 12hrs of wear, every time I lift my arms or twist or any movement at all it makes an annoying noise.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am purchasing more of these bras. They fit well and wear very comfortably. They wash and dry well in the washing machine. I've had these bras for a while now and the other day one of the underwires broke and started picking my skin. I had to stop wearing it. Hence, ordering more of them. They are inexpensive and decent quality, enough to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I do really love the look and it is really good. The reason I have it three stars is because the straps are to thin for bigger breasts so it does not offer full support (still good support considering the price) and I can see this bra easily getting worn down. I do live that the straps don't dig into the shoulders though. Honestly still an amazing bra for the price.
customer_reviews.author: My name is Ash

customer_reviews.title: The sizing was good however the underwire was miserable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra because of it's glowing reviews both on Amazon and on other sites. The sizing was good however the underwire was miserable. It dug into my ribs and left red welts on my skin. Who cares if the cups are soft? Who cares if the fabric doesn't cling to the underside of your shirt? Who cares if you can form the straps to make a racer back? The only thing I cared about was taking that bear trap off as quickly as possible. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: N O

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m petite only 4”10, 105lbs but I’m a 34C/32D depending on the bra. I got the 34C and I have to say I am quite impressed. It fits perfectly and is comfortable! The straps are perfect but again I’m short so may not fit well on someone really tall. The back doesn’t ride up like most bras and the wire doesn’t dig in. I would definitely recommend and will order more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not as great for small chests
customer_reviews.text: I fluctuate in size so I figured I would be a one size fits okay with the stretch. If you're smaller it feels like a weird placement and your free from the fit but covered. Not supportive at all. I cansee why larger chested girls would enjoy this bra because it does have alot of give. The bra is fine in and of itself and a good material, but i was misled by reviews and it was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana McComas

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised and in love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I would have never gone looking for a Hanes brand bra (I usually go to Victoria's Secret or department stores such as Macy's), but this bra is one of the most comfortable and flattering bras I've ever purchased. It's simple and practical. It lifts my chest without pushing up my boobs. I ordered this bra because it was one of the only comfortable looking racerback adjustable bras. I'm going to order more in different colors because I can't get enough of this bra! Excited to have an affordable, comfortable, and flattering bra as a part of my wardrobe. I'm super satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Re'Aunah Harper

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes I have felt like my straps aren't holding them up to a level ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficulty finding a bra that fits my 36DD size. I usually feel as if I don't have enough support. Sometimes I have felt like my straps aren't holding them up to a level I feel comfortable. Even Victoria Secret is not a match for comfort level with my size. I have always felt very uncomfortable and insecure. I took a chance on this bra, and I was so pleased! I feel proper support. The cup fits perfectly and the straps are great! The straps don't slip or loosen. I am overall pleased with this product, and I even ordered another one. Thank you Hanes.
customer_reviews.author: V. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a super basic bra, not very supportive (36 DD) and the cups seem to run a little small. Straps are thin and sort of flimsy, the material is soft, I just feel that this bra is better suited for smaller cup sizes. Also note that this Hanes bra arrived in a bright green bag with some lingerie store logo, with a shipping label slapped on it. Not discreet, and my neighbors thought I had purchased something a little more.... Exotic? Slightly embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: New favorite bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite bra! It’s so comfortable! I don’t have to tug at it, and the wire doesn’t bother me. Usually bras with wires dig into my side and pokes me, so I started wearing wireless bras. Well, the wireless bras are comfortable, but they make me sweat and leaves an odd odor. This is the first bra that I found that’s comfortable and gives decent support for those of us with bigger chests. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wire pokes out
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same size as another that I'd bought in a store. This one has the wires (or whatever they used) that stick out and poke my arms when they are at my sides. It's very uncomfortable and after wearing it about 4 times, I'm just not going to wear it anymore. It's been banished to my section of clothes to wear when I have nothing else clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sam F.

customer_reviews.title: Got a knock off.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I got a knock off. The color is totally wrong. It’s not oatmeal heather. And the clasps aren’t the silver with the Hanes engraved in them like legit Hanes products have. The claps are painted nude and definitely not the quality Hanes normally is. Definitely returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if it's a tiny bit too large or if it's just ridiculously comfortable. I'm used to being smooshed. I'm really happy you can't see the back digging in through my t shirt like you can w/ some brands. I have comfort/fit issues with Victoria secret, that I definitely don't have with this bra. As soon as I got it on I went to order more. Could be cuter, but it's not bad and it's worth it for the fit/comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bra. I wear a 38D which can be hard to find in the store. This bra is a perfect fit and feels great. I've owned it for a few months now and highly recommend it and will be buying in other colors. It is lightly lined and the 'petals' inside do not make circles on your shirt. They are hardly noticeable. The material is very smooth allowing for a clean silhouette. It also has an easy to use clip to turn the bra into a racer back fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shealy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: 36D Comfortable bra. Shoulder straps sometimes fall off but since it's new it hasn't stretched out. After washing it, it fit much better. No wire uncomfortableness. I wanted a bra that the straps don't slide off but overall this fit is comfortable on the bust and side areas. It's not see through since it has a light padding. Great support for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Gems

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this bra
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bra, I've since had to use nursing bras instead but this is my favorite bra otherwise. It fit great, the straps didn't slip, the back didn't ride up, the cups didn't gape, it was just pretty great. The only thing that started to happen (I blame trying to nurse with it a couple times and stretch the cups) was that it squeaked where the underwire met in the middle. Overall a great bra for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: lmd91

customer_reviews.title: Better than my much more expensive VS bras!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually surprised at how comfortable this bra is, even after a strenuous 12 hour day! Nice built-in nipple shields, very clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bra for the price - won't last forever
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bra. For the price, I will buy it again. I've bought bras for 4x the price that are also "pretty good". I've had this bra for a little over a year and the underwire just broke while I was pulling weeds. I'm actually OK with that. I didn't expect it to last forever and it's my go-to bra, so I'm glad with how long it lasted. I'm definitely glad it has the option for racer back since that looks good with tank tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bra band on the tight side and more padding than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got my normal size but the band seemed much tighter than normal and I can't wear it without a bra expander, so order a size or two up. The cups also were firmer than expected and too heavily padded for me. Didn't return it because I washed it first before trying on. Otherwise, probably would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSmartyPants

customer_reviews.title: Band Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 34D which is my usual size. The fabric is soft and would be very comfortable if the band had fit snuggly. But, unfortunately, the band was too loose which caused the cups to gap open. When I pulled the band tighter by about an inch the cups fit nicely and the bra would have been perfect. I would have exchanged for a smaller band size, but it seems 34 is the smallest they offer.
customer_reviews.author: someladysomewhere

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Should
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how badly I needed a T-shirt bra; I think most girls just accepted that our bras will show their outline for some shirts. Don't! This bra puts me at ease with its comfort and utility. There is no visible outline and it fits pretty true to size (I used to be a 34B, but now am sort of a 36B/C and went with 34B anyway). Support is minimum, but honestly, the same level of support as other bras. Also, don't expect much cleavage from this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: A must for us plus size gals
customer_reviews.text: YES! So hard to find a good multi bra that is tshirt friend - specially if you are plus size ... This bra does it all! It's comfortable, supportive, helps with "side boobs" (hehehe) and covers well. I have washed it several times and it still as awesome as ever. Just beware ... the cup size is a bit large and high. Not really and issue for because I use it mainly for tshirts but I did find it weird to wear with tank tops style shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft, comfortable bra, adequate for the price but if you are largish in the chest and not 20 years old anymore like me (y'all know who you are, haha) it's not really the best support. I will keep it for running errands etc, and keep looking for a higher quality racer back for more dressy occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value, and very comfy. None of that extra padding!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these bras, because they do the job, and aren't padded up like Dolly Parton. lol A quality item for a great price. Thanks for selling a practical item that is appropriate and non-frilly for those of us who just don't do 'fancy'. Excellent fit, and I love the gray.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 38C the band fit the cup divided and flattened me. Not a big fan of that the wire felt like they wanted to slide up from under my boobs all day even though the shoulders weren’t tight. Connecting the back to make a racer made it better but just didn’t care for the way it separated my breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Binaking

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if I'm going to use it
customer_reviews.text: The size is a bit small and the shape is very strange. It makes your tits pointed towards the sides. From above they look square, from the point of view of someone else or the mirror they look good. In addition, it has little support. The material looks nice and soft and it seems that the band is durable just like the wires of the cups. But the top of the cups and the straps is not very good ...
customer_reviews.author: Mery3008

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Hanes for the Best fit ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Initieally I ordered six different styles from Hanes and Maidenform. This was the ultimate keeper, the others were returned. PROS: Weight of a feather. Accentuates your cleavage. Great cup fit and comfort. No rough or unfinished edges anywhere. True to size measurement. I ordered three-more. CONS: Would appreciate a diverse color selection.
customer_reviews.author: B.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting bra I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this bra. I bought 2 of them because I trust Hanes to give a quality product and they did not disappoint here either. This is probably the most comfortable and best fitting bra I have ever owned. Fits true to size. Thank you Hanes for giving me comfort and quality fit.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and fits great, feels like silk or like it’s not even there! Lightweight, stays in place, and strap adjustments stay where I move them to as well. Cool to the touch and actually is one of the better t-shirt friendly bras I’ve ever owned, as the lines are not noticeable under my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Theses bras are just great!!! The fit is great and they are very comfortable!!! It lifts and feels better than any bra I've ever owned!!! The cups are very soft and feel great against my skin. The straps are just the right width and I will definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jax Smith

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so comfortable! With most bras, I want to rip it off when I get home from work, but this one, I barely notice I have it on. I like the fact that it only has 2 hooks. I wear a 36DD and most bras that I buy have 3 hooks and it just feels bulky. (This review is for the black heather one.) I also bought a nude one and it has 3 hooks and even though it's comfortable, it's not as comfortable as the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Lt

customer_reviews.title: No more PINK bras for me.
customer_reviews.text: This bra is AMAZING. I used to have the VS PINK bras that have the little hook on the back to make the straps very easily conertible into a racerback, but they stopped making them with that feature. This bra has that same important feature, is half the cost, and is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Fits great! For those of you having trouble finding your size, if you go down in the band size and up in the cup size it's the same fit. For example, maybe a 36C rides up on you a little bit, you can get a 34D and still have the same cup volume and the band will not ride up. Hopefully that makes sense. Anyway, it's a great bra!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but creaks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bra for about a month now, I have two actually. I love the fit, I love the feel, I find it flattering HOWEVER these are the loudest bras I have ever owned. They creak/squeak with EVERY movement- people have made comments and it is incredibly annoying to listen to. It was a quick fix however, removing the underwire from the cups with a quick snip and now its silent and still amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love this bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. It fits perfect and is very comfortable and flattering. I will definitely be purchasing again in the future. The polka dot design is also very cute. Who would have thought that Hanes could make the PERFECT bra! Thanks amazon and Hanes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for full round busts
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this bra and was convinced it would be perfect. It wasn't. Although the material is super soft and comfy, it just does not fit well for a full round bust shape. The cups are pointy and flat and not accommodating if you have a rounder breast shape. I am also short and the straps at their tightest did fall off my shoulders immediately. I wear a 38D and it did fit true to size, but the bra is just shaped unaccommodating and inflexible.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite Bra!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about how inexpensive this bra was but it was given high reviews on a number of websites so I thought...why not. It is a great bra. The sizing guide was accurate and it's really, really comfortable! I only wish they sold it in a Nude color. I ordered the Oatmeal Heather thinking it was close to nude but it's way lighter and you can see it through a white or light colored shirt. I'll definitely be buying this bra again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L Whelpley

customer_reviews.title: Decent bra for sitting on the couch weight gain
customer_reviews.text: After months of doing my part staying indoors and hanging out in the couch; my bras have all mysteriously shrunk. In desperation I ordered this bra and thank goodness it fits great, looks good and will help me get back up off the couch and out in the world once again (with a face mask on of course).
customer_reviews.author: Roodog73

customer_reviews.title: Teen daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Tall and thin but a 34B bra, my teen is so picky about bras! It takes days to pick one out so I was ecstatic when she liked this one. They fit her great. Very comfortable. Look great under tshirts. Wash really well. I bought her 6 in different colors so safe to say they are liked in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Picky CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy - I forget I’m wearing it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleasantly surprised at how much I like this bra! It’s very soft and lightweight and the fit is perfect for me. I’m small-chested just a B cup so I don’t need a heavy duty bra that has to carry and support a lot of weight so this light bra works well for me. I forget I have it on, and THAT is how I define the perfect bra!
customer_reviews.author: AndieJoy

customer_reviews.title: No more pinching, rolls, or gaps
customer_reviews.text: Love these bras! So soft and they fit small sized women without leaving gaps or causing side rolls; no lines showing through with tee shirt wears and no pinching or rubbing with underwire. Ordered one and reordered another because of fit. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: This bra runs big. I ordered my typical size and the cups are too big as is the band. I ordered a 36B but it fits like a 38C. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear maidenform bras. Decided to give these a try which I’m glad I did! True to size and doesn’t even feel like I have anything on. Good support. Think a find a one favorite
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but read their size chart.
customer_reviews.text: This has great straps and bands and is a comfortable bra however pay close attention to the sizing. It isn’t so much about band size as it is about cup size. The band is very adjustable but the larger sizes have larger cup sizes. I was on the edge or a size and should have opted for the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: geegeem

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 34c and I found this to be a good value and comfortable t shirt bra. It gives a nice shape and doesn’t create too much bulging under the arms or across the back. The cups are thick enough to prevent any embarrassing show though with light fitting outfits. Not super luxury feeling, instead more like an every day bra.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect t shirt bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34c but got a 36c so it didn't have to stretch. It is honestly the most comfortable bra I own. I ordered the oatmeal heather and got nude, no heathering. I don't even care because I love it! It is very smooth under all fabrics I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: sheila .J

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bra isn’t frilly or fancy, but it is SO comfortable! Seriously! I tried it on and it feels amazing! So soft, feels like I’m wearing nothing. I wish all bras felt this good! It’s a plain looking bra, which is fine by me. I have other “fancier” bras (that were much more expensive) and this one beats them in comfort and fit. For an everyday wear, this bra is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MB Reed-Piltz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these for hanging around the house or running errands. I wear a more supportive and flattering bra when I go out. However, this bra does have some support and is very comfortable, it just doesn't give the desired "lift" of a push up bra. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Green Lights, Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Good bra
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bras. They are comfortable and seem to be durable. I bought my first one 2 years ago and bought two more last year and more this year because they are so much better than what I have in the drawer. I wash mine in the washing machine and they still hold shape. The cup and underwire are nice, they do not dig into you like some of the other fuller figured underwire bras.
customer_reviews.author: M.U.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little larger in the length ( cup size is perfect )
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy ... does not dig into the body ... my goto bra for all dresses
customer_reviews.author: M.prime

customer_reviews.title: Not for women with tear drop shape breasts.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for those bras as I really liked their underwears. Unfortunately the bra was made of these rough materials that makes my skin itch. I had no idea why but it’s very uncomfortable. Also, the cut was not ideal with women with tear drop shape breasts. The cup was wide rather then deep, so it fits very strangely. It presses the breasts down but still leaves gap on the side of the bra.
customer_reviews.author: YunXIAO

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this bra, but it didn’t fit me well. I am a 42C and the cups were spread way too far apart in the front. My boobs were pointing off to either side. If you have a wider chest, it would most likely fit perfectly. Well constructed and soft, but didn’t fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Cox

customer_reviews.title: It's great except the shoulder straps, sadly
customer_reviews.text: I had cancer and have been looking for a bra soft enough to not bother my scars. This one certainly is the best so far. I'm small and bought a 34B but found that I can't adjust the shoulder straps enough to fit on the side of my surgery. I used to get Barely There bras that fit perfectly and never had a problem with them hitting the scars but I can't find them anymore. Although I like this bra, I'll have to keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: boquin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: They are very soft bras, but they didn't work for me. The 36C was a bit small and the 36D gapped at the sides a bit. We're all bit differently, however, so it obviously just isn't going to work from my shape. May work well on others.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: I wish this came in my size!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this bra when it fit. I've been going through a tremendous weight-loss journey, and unfortunately my girls lost the most, and I'm now a size 32C, which apparently this bra isn't made in. But this bra was sincerely amazing and comfortable, not visible under t-shirts, and I LOVE the hook in the back that turns it into a racerback.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Superb fit
customer_reviews.text: A bra that fits! Expensive bras don’t fit me. I suppose I’m weirdly shaped. (If cup width is right, I usually can’t fill the cup volume unless I’m pregnant or breastfeeding. I suppose that means I’m small breasted, and barrel chested...?) This is THE only bra that has ever fit just right. And straps don’t fall off my shoulders all the time. I am almost 40. Where was this when I was in my 20s??
customer_reviews.author: CDLH Linde

customer_reviews.title: Apparently I was allergic to it
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I washed this bra, it itched. Mostly where the underwire was. I bought this on my husband's account. He got tired of hearing me complain about being itchy so after only wearing it once, and washing it five times, I threw it out. With the exception of the itchyness, it was comfortable. There is NO lift in the bra though, so might as well wear a non-wired bra.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash and hang dry
customer_reviews.text: Fits good and feels good. Washing them over and over has caused the cups to crease in some spots and pucker. I use these for work only. I sweat a lot and I have 5, so washing is very important. So if you want to wash them every other day, this is not a good bra for you.
customer_reviews.author: Danette E Merwin

customer_reviews.title: Too Flimsy for Large Breasts
customer_reviews.text: Although Good Housekeeping listed this bra as agood choice for women with large breasts, I can tell you from experience that I found the material and construction to be poor for anyone with large breasts. I wear a 38DD or a 36DDD and I purchased the 38DD. It did not provide any support. The material is too thin and the straps are also on the flimsy side. If you wear a C cup or less, it may provide sufficient support, but if you wear larger sizes, it will not.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Van Erden

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but I don't think it'll hold up
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, discreet and keeps everything in place, even for those of us who really make undergarments work. Unfortunately, the straps are stretchy, too, and the adjustable bit is not very long. I'm already out of room to tighten it further and I've had it for a week. We'll see if this spells the end.
customer_reviews.author: Allison N Hurd

customer_reviews.title: So so so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the most comfortable bras I have ever owned. I'm glad I tried this after reading a recommendation online. The material is so soft. The bra does not cut in to your chest and it feels great all day.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Stretches Out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it. Personally, this did not have any support and it stretched out within a week. The material is soft, like a t-shirt, and I think that is why it stretched out. Unfortunately, I just pitched it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: A must have for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a bra that I absolutely love! For years I have spent so much money on plain janes to fancy name brand and everything in between. These bras are extremely comfortable, durable and fit as expected. I loved them so much that I have purchased 8 of them. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice t shirt bra
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the white in size 34B. Soft and comfortable. Loved the price! Reference: I am 39 yo, 5"4', 130 lbs. I have an athletic build with bigger-than-average thighs/bum/shoulders with a smaller waist. I usually wear size small shirt, size 6/8 pant, a size small dress (or size 4/6), 8.0 W or 8.5 M shoe, and a 34B bra.
customer_reviews.author: Love 5280

customer_reviews.title: Very Tight
customer_reviews.text: The band is extremely tight considering how large the cup size is, not proportionate at all unfortunately. The cups don’t give much support either. Wore it once or twice and probably will not wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on 'most comfortable bras' which lead me to this purchase. I will definitely hands down give it the MOST COMFORTABLE BRA rating. The only th iij ng that kind of bugs me is it separates my tatas too far.
customer_reviews.author: DeterminedDIY

customer_reviews.title: Bought more because of the comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I got one to try. This is so comfortable! I have a bad neck and many bras, even expensive ones tend to put stress on my shoulders and neck. This one is easy to adjust and VERY comfortable! Bought more because of the comfort. Don't expect any push up, this one is all about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee0209

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: When worn with the straps in the conventional way, the fit was ok. However, when the straps are attached together as the "racerback", even with the straps lengthened completely, the bra was up around my armpits (above my desired targets) . Would not buy this product again and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable bra I’ve ever worn. Not only is it soft but you have the option to wear it as a racer or shoulder back. Perfect to wear around the house & lounge in. I bought 4 more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: AnneKR

customer_reviews.title: Finished breast feeding desperate need of a new gra.  Not what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This bra doesn’t comfort my needs . It fits but needs more padding and I don’t like the flower thing to keep nipples from popping out. From day one the cup has wrinkles isn’t perfectly smooth like I wanted it. Since it fits and I need a bra I am wearing it til I can afford a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hanes fits me the best
customer_reviews.text: For some reason only Hanes bras fit me well. They are soft but supportive and do not cut into any areas . Most other brands are uncomfortable under my arms. This one is the most comfortable. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heeg

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these bras after having previously purchased one in the store. I wear a 36C and the bras fit beautifully. This model was purchased after trying on many other brands and styles.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Sampelayo

product_meta.title: Hanes Women's Ultimate T-Shirt Soft Foam Underwire
product_meta.description: Comfort never looked so good. Our Hanes ultimate bra collection delivers the ultimate in comfort, style and innovation. Who says you can't have it all.
feature_bullets: Underwire bra featuring contoured cups with four-way stretch band at center
Adjustable straps that can be worn over shoulders or in racerback silhouette
